item.description:
The Lawaaris, The Sharaabi, The Don, The Muqadar ka Sikandar, From Amar Akbar Anthony to Namak Halaal, The Shahensha, The Angry Young Man, The Coolie.

The Legend is back to give you some Jummmmmmmmmmas this Friday only at Caprice Boston for our Signature "BIG B BASH 2011" (END OF THE YEAR SPECIAL)

        

Make your reservations now. RSVP so this Lawaaris can add you to the Guest list. The Legendary Amitabh Bachchan the most recognized name in Bollywood across the world for the past few Decades has the most recognized songs in the Industry too

This Friday we will recreate the magic. Please RSVP with names of guests that you plan on coming with. Do Not Miss out on the Best Bollywood Party of the Year.

Downstairs: Dj Dru Nyce/ Top 40/ Hip Hop

Upstairs: Music Provided by Dj Jay & Bailu (DJ Jay's Farewell Bash as well)

To RSVP send email to Generationdesi@gmail.com

Plenty of Parking Available. $10 Cover on the Guestlist with RSVP or Call Ravi for Reservations/ Questions at 6174168705

Caprice Boston is located at 275 Tremont St, Boston MA (Party is on the 2nd Floor) I can't wait to Party and Dance to my Bollywood :)
item.name: Big B Bash Party (A Tribute to Amitabh Bachchan Hits) @ Caprice Friday
